title: How do I remove my latest Android update? Updated on Jan 5th 2021 and now phone goes into boot loop
content:
Since Jan 5th android update my phone goes into a boot loop when plugged into pc or car. Fine when on factory charger, can't use Android auto etc.
Was working fine before, did the update and now it's playing up. 
I would like to remove the latest update if I can.
